name: Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design.
syllabus: Week 1: HTML & CSS, Week 2: JavaScript Basics, Week 3: Responsive Design, Week 4: React

name: Data Structures
description: Introduction to data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.
syllabus: Week 1: Arrays & Linked Lists, Week 2: Stacks & Queues, Week 3: Trees, Week 4: Graphs
prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge in any language

name: Algorithms
description: Study of algorithm design techniques such as divide and conquer, dynamic programming, and greedy algorithms.
syllabus: Week 1: Sorting & Searching, Week 2: Divide & Conquer, Week 3: Dynamic Programming, Week 4: Greedy Algorithms

name: Database Systems
description: Comprehensive study of database systems including SQL, database design, and transaction management.
syllabus: Week 1: Introduction to Databases, Week 2: SQL Queries, Week 3: Database Design, Week 4: Transactions

name: Operating Systems
description: Learn the fundamentals of operating systems, including process management, memory management, and file systems.
syllabus: Week 1: Introduction to Operating Systems, Week 2: Process Management, Week 3: Memory Management, Week 4: File Systems

name: Computer Networks
description: Introduction to networking concepts, including OSI model, TCP/IP, and network protocols.
syllabus: Week 1: OSI Model, Week 2: TCP/IP, Week 3: Routing Protocols, Week 4: Network Security

name: Software Engineering
description: Study of software development life cycle, methodologies, and project management in software engineering.
syllabus: Week 1: Software Development Life Cycle, Week 2: Agile Methodologies, Week 3: Project Management, Week 4: Software Testing

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to artificial intelligence concepts, including machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.
syllabus: Week 1: Introduction to AI, Week 2: Machine Learning, Week 3: Neural Networks, Week 4: Natural Language Processing
